trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Providence
There were no other sightings in Providence on or around April 30th 1984
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy father, my friend and I, went to a field to play, after about 10 minutes into playing basball, I noticed an object looking like a wierd shape, I said, "look", to them and they looked up and they saw the object. My dad said it looked CIGAR shaped, and it hovered for a few minutes blending in and out of the clouds, and then vanished. It was strange to see something we could not think of an explanation for just that it was an UFO. This happened in 1984. I can only attach a sketch I made.
Summary: floating in the clouds as if to blend in or made them, then vanished
